title: Crypto Privacy Glossary: Dusting, Peel Chains, Chain-Hopping and Other Terms You Keep Asking AI About
quickSteps: Look up clear, plain-language explanations for terms such as dusting attack, peel chain, chain-hopping and tainted coins before changing your setup.
Map which glossary risks actually apply to your own usage by listing chains, assets, services and how often you move between custodial and non-custodial environments.

Turn the most relevant terms into a short checklist of habits like avoiding address reuse, not merging suspicious dust with large UTXOs and keeping separate wallets for savings, trading and experiments.
Sanity-check privacy tutorials about mixers, CoinJoin and bridges against current AML realities and avoid over-complicating routes with unnecessary high-risk hops.
Prepare neutral, jargon-free explanations for significant crypto flows so you can answer banks, auditors or tax authorities calmly without oversharing sensitive details.

seo.keywords: crypto privacy glossary, dusting attack, peel chain, chain-hopping, tainted coins, crypto AML terms, UTXO hygiene, bitcoin privacy, no KYC swaps, ETZ Swap
seo.description: Understand dusting attacks, peel chains, chain-hopping and other crypto privacy and AML terms in plain English, with practical steps to protect your wallet.
